TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CodeGeneratorOptions extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示代码生成器使用的一组选项。

span.span: Represents a set of options used by a code generator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递到的代码生成方法实现，以指定代码生成期间使用的选项。 is passed to the code generation methods of an implementation to specify options used during code generation. 属性指定要用于每个间距缩进的字符串。The property specifies the string to use for each spacing indentation. 属性指定大括号，该值指示代码块的边界的放置样式。The property specifies the placement style for braces indicating the boundaries of code blocks. 属性指定是否要追加`else`， `catch`，或`finally`块，包括方括号括起来，在结束行中的每个`if`或`try`块。The property specifies whether to append an `else`, `catch`, or `finally` block, including brackets, at the closing line of each `if` or `try` block. 属性指定是否插入成员之间的空行。The property specifies whether to insert blank lines between members. 实现可以提供自定义代码生成选项可以设置或将数据传递给使用字典索引器，代码生成器可以搜索以找到额外的代码生成选项。An implementation can provide custom code generation options which you can set or pass data to using the dictionary indexer, which a code generator can search through to locate additional code generation options. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含链接要求，并且在类级别应用于所有成员继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时，将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples [!code-cpp[CodeGeneratorOptionsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeGeneratorOptionsExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CodeGeneratorOptionsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeGeneratorOptionsExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CodeGeneratorOptionsExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeGeneratorOptionsExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

permission.span: 直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码使用。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BlankLinesBetweenMembers { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在成员之间插入空行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to insert blank lines between members.

value.span: 如果应插入空行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if blank lines should be inserted; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认情况下，此属性的值为 。

span.span: By default, the value of this property is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BracingStyle { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于大括号的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style to use for bracing.

value.span: 包含要使用的大括号样式的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the bracing style to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值是`Block`，指示该代码应该以便大括号开始的语句或与之关联的声明与位于同一行上生成。The default value of this property is `Block`, which indicates that code should be generated so that braces start on the same line as the statement or declaration that they are associated with. 属性值`C`表示大括号开始与之关联的行后面的语句或声明。A property value of `C` indicates that braces start on the line following the statement or declaration that they are associated with.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ElseOnClosing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在前面每个 或 块的结束行处追加 、 或 块（包括括号）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to append an , , or block, including brackets, at the closing line of each previous or block.

value.span: 如果应追加 else，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an else should be appended; otherwise, .
The default value of this property is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ IndentString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于缩进的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string to use for indentations.

value.span: 包含用于缩进的字符的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the characters to use for indentations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值是"/---/"（4 个空格）。The default value of this property is "/----/" (four spaces).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字典提供了一种扩展机制供开发人员的代码生成器的自定义功能提供数据。This dictionary provides an extensibility mechanism for developers to provide data for custom features of a code generator. 代码生成器必须实现此类功能，支持检查字典中可有用的。A code generator must implement such features and support checking the dictionary for this to be useful.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool VerbatimOrder { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否按成员在成员集合中出现的顺序生成成员。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to generate members in the order in which they occur in member collections.

value.span: 如果要按成员在成员集合中出现的顺序生成成员，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to generate the members in the order in which they occur in the member collection; otherwise, .
The default value of this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下生成成员按其类型，例如;字段、 成员、 构造函数或属性。The default generates members by their type, for example; field, member, constructor, or property. 可以使用代码生成器属性以将 #region 块注入代码，从而更改顺序。A code generator can use the property to inject #region blocks into code, thus changing the order.
